title: Single Rotary Mini Tablet Machine
descriptions: Introducing the Semi-Automatic Single Disc Capsule Counting Machine by Bharat Pharmatech - a compact, highly efficient, and cost-effective solution for capsule and tablet counting and packaging. Designed with ergonomics in mind, this machine is easy to handle and maintain for operators, ensuring seamless operations and accurate results. Its versatility allows it to count and pack capsules and tablets of any size with precision, meeting the highest standards of Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP). Trust Bharat Pharmatech's semi-automatic machines for trouble-free operations and consistently reliable performance, helping you maintain excellence in pharmaceutical manufacturing.

features_lists.name: Salient Features of Single Rotary Mini Tablet Machine
list: Pre-compression facility as a standard feature
AC variable drive and fixed pulley. It is driven from central pillar by worm reduction gear box.
Lower guards of stainless steel & upper guards of transparent acrylic to view tablet compression process of the machine comfortably.
Granules are fed through an open feed frame which ensures trouble-free settings and minimum wastage of valuable material
Force feeding attachment is optional accessories for difficult, fluffy & fine granule compression.
Table top, Mobile & easy to cleanTable top, Mobile & easy to clean
For easy operation outside controls are given for Pre Compression adjustment, tablet thickness adjustment and turret speed adjustment
